name.ja: パパのスクーパリアのブロック解除
name.th: แบตช์เสร็จสิ้นการขบวนการพ่นเป็นชายแดนทางตะวันตก คุณพาป้าประมูลเฟ้อใส่ไม้ที่ถูกไมก้องขายได้ในชายแดนความเป็นอิสระ ใช้สมัครใจในการทำสูตรไอศกรีมอันให้ซอกซอย ใช้ทัวริสต์การพนันของคุณเก็บเงินเป็นเงินปันผลสำหรับการตกแต่งรถเข็น, Parrel, องค์กร, Fontivey.

short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Papa’s Scooperia Unblocked as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.bg: Играйте Papa's Scooperia Unblocked като разширение за Chrome - Също можете да играете без интернет, опитайте сега!
short.ca: Juga a Papa's Scooperia Desbloquejat com a una extensió de Chrome - També pots jugar sense internet, prova-ho ara!
short.cs: Hrajte Papa's Scooperia Unblocked jako rozšíření pro Chrome - Můžete také hrát bez připojení k internetu, vyzkoušejte to hned teď!
short.da: Spil Papa's Scooperia Unblocked som en Chrome-udvidelse - Du kan også spille uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de: Spielen Sie Papa's Scooperia Unblocked als Chrome-Erweiterung - Sie können es auch ohne Internet spielen. Probieren Sie es jetzt…
short.el: Παίξτε το Papa's Scooperia Unblocked ως πρόσθετο Chrome - Μπορείτε επίσης να παίξετε χωρίς σύνδεση στο internet, δοκιμάστε το τώρα!
short.es: Juega a Papa's Scooperia desbloqueado como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Jouez à Papa's Scooperia Unblocked en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.fi: Pelaa Papa's Scooperia Estetty lisäosa Chromessa - Voit myös pelata ilman Internet-yhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: I-play ang Papa's Scooperia Unblocked bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari rin I-play nang walang Internet, subukan ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à Papa's Scooperia Unblocked en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.he: הפעל Papaâ€™s Scooperia Unblocked כהרחבה של Chrome - ניתן גם לשחק בלעדי חיבור לאינטרנט, נסה עכשיו!
short.hi: Jouez à Papa's Scooperia débloqué en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.hr: Igrajte Papa's Scooperia odblokirano kao Chrome proširenje - Također možete igrati i bez interneta, isprobajte sada!
short.hu: Játszd a Papa's Scooperia Unblocked-ot Chrome-bővítményként - emellett játszhatsz internet nélkül is, próbáld ki most!
short.id: Mainkan Papa's Scooperia yang tidak terblokir sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Anda juga bisa Mainkan tanpa Internet, coba sekarang!
short.it: Gioca a Papa's Scooperia Unblocked come estensione per Chrome - Puoi anche giocare senza Internet, provalo ora!
short.ja: Chrome拡張機能としてPapa's Scooperia Unblockedをプレイする - インターネットに接続せずにプレイも可能です、今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램으로 Papaâ€™s Scooperia 언블록 된 버전을 플레이하세요 - 또한 인터넷없이도 플레이할 수 있습니다. 지금 바로 확인해보세요!
short.lt: Žaiskite Papa’s Scooperia Unblocked kaip „Chrome“ plėtinį. Taip pat galite žaisti be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlēt "Papa's Scooperia Unblocked" kā Google Chrome paplašinājumu - Raktuvju iedegšanas režīmā var arī spēlēt bez interneta,…
short.ms: Mainkan Papa's Scooperia Unblocked sebagai sambungan Chrome - Juga boleh Dimainkan tanpa Internet, cuba sekarang!

short.no: Juega Papa's Scooperia desbloqueado como una extensión de Chrome - También se puede jugar sin internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.pl: Zagraj w Papę Scooperia Unblocked jako rozszerzenie Chrome - Można także grać bez internetu, spróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Joacă Papa's Scooperia Unblocked ca o extensie Chrome - De asemenea, poți juca fără conexiune la internet, încearcă acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Papaâ€™s Scooperia Unblocked в виде расширения для Chrome - Можно также играть без интернета, попробуйте сейчас!
short.sk: Play Papa's Scooperia Unblocked as a Chrome extension - Also, you can play without Internet, try it now!
short.sl: Play Papa's Scooperia Unblocked as a Chrome extension - Also can play without internet, try it now!
short.sr: Igrajte Papa's Scooperia Unblocked kao Chrome ekstenziju - Takođe možete igrati bez interneta, isprobajte odmah!
short.sv: Spela Papa's Scooperia Unblocked som en Chrome-tillägg - Kan även spelas utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่น Papa's Scooperia Unblocked เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - ยังสามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ต ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.tr: Chrome uzantısı olarak Bağımsız Papa Scooperia oyna - Ayrıca İnternet olmadan da oynayabilirsiniz, hemen deneyin!

short.vi: Chơi Papa's Scooperia Unblocked như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần Internet, bây giờ hãy thử ngay!
short.zh_CN: 将Papa's Scooperia Unblocked作为一个Chrome扩展程序进行游玩-还可以在没有互联网的情况下游玩，立即试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 在Chrome擴充功能中玩Papa's Scooperia Unblocked-也可以在無網路的情況下玩，立即試試看吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play more games on the top-left menu.
⭐ Papa’s Scooperia Unblocked - Serve up Delicious Fun! 🍨🍦

Indulge in the culinary delights of Papa’s Scooperia Unblocked, now available as a Chrome extension! Experience the joy of running your own ice cream parlor without interruptions, even when offline. Dive into a world of sweet treats, creative sundaes, and endless fun as you manage your shop and satisfy the cravings of your virtual customers.

🎮 Game Features:

Chrome Extension: Access Papa’s Scooperia directly as a Chrome extension for convenience and ease of play.
Offline Mode: Enjoy the game anytime, anywhere, even without an internet connection. Perfect for uninterrupted gaming sessions!
Custom Sundaes: Create delicious sundaes with a variety of toppings, mix-ins, and flavors to keep your customers coming back for more.
Shop Management: Take charge of your ice cream parlor, managing orders, and upgrading your equipment for maximum efficiency.
🕹️ How to Play:

Access as Chrome Extension: Install the Papa’s Scooperia Unblocked Chrome extension for quick and easy access.
Offline Enjoyment: Play seamlessly without an internet connection, making it ideal for on-the-go gaming.
Serve Delicious Treats: Take orders, scoop ice cream, and assemble sundaes with precision to satisfy your virtual customers.
Upgrade Your Shop: Earn in-game currency to upgrade your equipment, enhance your shop, and unlock new features.
🍦 Ready to Scoop Up Some Fun? Try Papa’s Scooperia Unblocked Now! 🌟🍧
